Posts.Content: I am so pleased I found this forum and this discussion.I have had  horrific side effects. Very sore hands ( I have athiritis  anyway), and sore  joints and dizzy spells.I took a funny turn in a shop last week and had to sit down..I have dumped it and feel better already I am going to see my GP to ask for Femaia..Not sure I will get it..
Posts.Title: Letrozole - side effects and supplements
